<MembersIndex>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;FolderTy, InserterTy&gt;</a></>}>
This provides a uniform API for creating instructions and inserting them into a basic block: either at the end of a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a>, or at a specific iterator location in a block. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>
